name: Devil Corp
description:
Devil Corp Is A Management/Strategy Game Originally Based On Pikmin Where You Control A Mining Company To Gain As Much Money As You Can In 30 Days - Made For Scratch Game Jam 2 - https://cocrea.world/@Outrunfungus43/DevilCorp

Unlock New Locations By Using Your Workers To Brake Walls But Dont Forget To Collect Ore But Dont Forget To Unlock New Locations Before You Run Out Of Caves Optimisation Is Key

Workers (Red) Turn 1 Raw Ore To Due Ore Each

Gatherers (White) Collect 1 Due Ore Each

However, These Are Not Your Only Employee Types As You Need To Deal With Other Problems While You Optimise Your 30 Days
